@graph.description: EU funding for the MARine COastal BiOdiversity Long-term Observations (MARCO-BOLO) project under Horizon Europe programme call HORIZON-CL6-2022-BIODIV-01-01 (Biodiversity and ecosystem services). Total project budget is 8614089.50 EUR with EU contribution of 7255037.50 EUR. Project duration: 48 months (December 1, 2022 - November 30, 2026).
@graph.name: Horizon Europe Grant for MARCO-BOLO
